output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017 PSD GIURGIU SENAT" is present at the end of the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Makes direct reference to "Marcel Ciolacu" as "viitorul președinte", who is one of the presidential candidates.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - This is a paid post targeting Giurgiu county with significant reach (250,000-300,000 impressions) and substantial spending (2500-3000 RON).
4. Electoral objective: Yes - The post clearly has electoral objectives: - Promotes Marcel Ciolacu as "viitorul președinte" - Criticizes the current liberal administration - Calls for votes ("VOTAȚI PENTRU FAMILIILE VOASTRE!") - Makes electoral promises
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a structured campaign message with clear electoral objectives, posted by "PSD Giurgiu" as indicated in the byline.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Makes direct references to presidential candidate - Contains clear calls to vote - Makes electoral promises - Is paid advertising with wide reach - Uses campaign messaging structure
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Giurgiu, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit pe Facebook (ID: 2394020644263136) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea promoveaza explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU ca "viitorul președinte" si face promisiuni electorale in numele acestuia, avand un impact direct asupra alegerilor prezidentiale. Mesajul a fost promovat dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel perioada legala de campanie electorala. Postarea a avut o audienta semnificativa, atingand intre 250.000 si 300.000 de afisari, cu o investitie intre 2.500 si 3.000 RON.
